record.description: [Photographic copy of a map of the village of Hyde Park map by L. M. Snyder and Company showing sewerage and drainage. Signed by A. J Powell, Superintendent of Public Works.]
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: The original map is located in Series II, Oversize A.Scanned from a color transparency. The original is fragile and damaged.
record.noteCopyright: Copyright 1888 by L.M. Snyder and Company.
